sentences.en: A constant threat of unemployment hangs over thousands of university researchers.
sentences.cn: 持续存在的失业威胁困扰着数千名大学科研人员。

sentences.en: He has accepted a research professorship at Cambridge University.
sentences.cn: 他接受了剑桥大学的研究员一职。

sentences.en: He teaches Esperanto at that university.
sentences.cn: 他在那所大学教世界语。

sentences.en: His beautifully illustrated book well attested his love of the university.
sentences.cn: 他那本带有精美插图的书见证了他对大学的热爱。

sentences.en: His course at Sheffield University will not recommence until next year.
sentences.cn: 他在谢菲尔德大学的课程要到明年才能继续。

sentences.en: I gradually got rather disillusioned with the whole setup of the university.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，我对大学的整个体制感到相当失望。

sentences.en: I then went up to Lancaster University and got an upper second.
sentences.cn: 后来，我考上了兰开斯特大学，获得了二级甲等学位。

sentences.en: In comparison, in university, no one cares what you do.
sentences.cn: 然而，在大学，基本上没有人在意你的表现。

sentences.en: She buddied up with a student from another university.
sentences.cn: 她与来自另一大学的一名学生交朋友。

sentences.en: She was Dean of the Science faculty at Sophia University.
sentences.cn: 她是上智大学科学院的院长。

sentences.en: The student left the university to go out into the world and find himself.
sentences.cn: 这个学生离开了大学进入社会去发现自己的才能所在。

sentences.en: The university refused to let Dick Gregory speak on campus.
sentences.cn: 这所大学不让迪克·格雷戈里在校园里发表演说。

sentences.en: There are thousands of students absolutely gagging to come to this university.
sentences.cn: 肯定有成千上万的学生都渴望到这所大学念书。

sentences.en: They attended college together at the University of Pennsylvania.
sentences.cn: 他们一起就读于宾夕法尼亚大学。

sentences.en: They had met by chance at university and finished up getting married.
sentences.cn: 他们在大学偶遇，最后结了婚。

sentences.en: Wakoski is writer in residence at Michigan State University.
sentences.cn: 瓦科斯基是密歇根州立大学的常驻作家。

sentences.en: Why do you go to university?
sentences.cn: 你为什么上大学呢？

sentences.en: Why should a great community like a university be afraid of nihilism?
sentences.cn: 为什么像大学这样人才济济的社区要害怕虚无主义呢？

sentences.en: You come out of university and find there are no jobs available.
sentences.cn: 从大学毕业后却找不到工作。

sentences.en: Youngsters coming up to university were being called up.
sentences.cn: 快上大学的青年人受到征召。

trans.tran_cn: 综合性大学，大学人员，大学校舍
trans.tran_en: an educational institution at the highest level, where you study for a degree
an educational institution at the highest level, where you study for a degree
